definitions.definition: ( uncountable ) A system for sending messages and datas by means of computers connected together in a network .
examples: He sent me his details via email .
The advent of email has simultaneously brought our society closer together and farther apart.

Please stop sending me “constructive criticisms ” via email , or telling me that “ I feel you are being defensive ”, especially just after I have told you “you’re loved”. “Rewards” like that are horrible.

definitions.definition: ( uncountable ) The quantity of messages sent through an email system.
examples: I am searching through my old email .
My inbox used to allow only 50 MB of email at a time until last year, when they upgraded it to 2 GBs!

definitions.definition: ( countable ) A message being sent through email.
examples: He sent me an email last week to remind me about the meeting.
I archive my old emails using a cloud-based service.
In this system, your username is your email .
Don’t send personal messages to my work email .

main_definition: ( uncountable ) A system for sending messages and datas by means of computers connected together in a network .
secondary_definitions: ( uncountable ) The quantity of messages sent through an email system.
( countable ) A message being sent through email.

main_definition: ( obsolete , rare ) Enamel ( “ an opaque , glossy coating ” ) .
